wrapScienceJ.wrapImaJ.core.metaData

Class MetaCalibration3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrapScienceJ.metaData.container.MetaDataContainer
      • wrapScienceJ.metaData.container.MetaData
        • wrapScienceJ.metaData.container.MetaDataRetriever
          • wrapScienceJ.wrapImaJ.core.metaData.MetaCalibration3D

  • public class MetaCalibration3D
extends MetaDataRetriever
    Allows to ask the user for the calibration parameters for an image.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MetaCalibration3D

        public MetaCalibration3D(ImageCore image,
                         MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy retrievalPolicy,
                         java.lang.String subdir,
                         VoxelDouble voxelsSize,
                         java.lang.String lengthUnit)
        Parameters:
        image - the image for which calibration data is required. (e.g. requires to calibrate from a configuration file with metadata or a dialog) The config file's postfix is hard coded in the static attribute m_configFilePostfix.
        retrievalPolicy - The policy to retrieve the parameters (known values, config file, user input...)
        subdir - Sub-directory of the default gobal directory in which the default global metadata file should be looked for.
        voxelsSize - a voxel the coordinates of which represent the lengths of the edges of all voxels in an anisotropic image. e.g. Voxel width=0.103; Voxel height=0.103; Voxel depth=0.2; unit=µm
        lengthUnit - the length unit in which the edges lengths are expressed (e.g. Lenth unit=µm)

      • MetaCalibration3D

        public MetaCalibration3D(ImageCore image,
                         MetaDataRetriever.RetrievalPolicy retrievalPolicy,
                         java.lang.String subdir)
        Parameters:
        image - the image for which calibration data is required. (e.g. requires to calibrate from a configuration file with metadata or a dialog) The config file's postfix is hard coded in th static attribute m_configFilePostfix.
        retrievalPolicy - The policy to retrieve the parameters (known values, config file, user input...)
        subdir - Sub-directory of the default gobal directory in which the default global metadata file should be looked for.
